Text: FANTASTIC!  I have to admit that I don't agree with the philosophy espoused, but it's still a fascinating book.  Thanks a lot for sharing this Mothra!
you're welcome!  for me, bad is bad and good is good and there is no grey, so I really dug on this book.  Glad you enjoy it, and all the other Ditko stuff!

My share ratio on this has reached 7.7 so now it's up to you all to keep it going due to my limited bandwidth.

Please seed and enjoy
